com.jaunt.component
Class OptionComponent

java.lang.Object
  com.jaunt.component.OptionComponent

public class OptionComponent
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an HTML or XHTML menu option component.

Since:
0.9.0
Author:
Tom Cervenka

Field Summary
 Element element
          The Element representing the option component.
 
Constructor Summary
OptionComponent(Element optionElement, SelectComponent selectComponent)
          Creates an option component from the specified option Element and its parent SelectComponent.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getText()
          Returns the innerText of the option element.
 java.lang.String getValue()
          Returns either the value of the value attribute, or if none exists, the concatenated text children of the option tag:
 boolean isSelected()
          Whether the option is flagged as 'selected'.
 void setSelected(boolean value)
          Sets whether the option is flagged as 'selected', and if so, removes the 'selected' flag from any other option if the parent selectComponent has the multipeEnabled flag set to false.
 void setValue(java.lang.String value)
          Sets the value of the menu option.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns a string representation of the option component.

setSelected

Sets whether the option is flagged as 'selected', and if so, removes the 'selected' flag from any other option if the parent selectComponent has the multipeEnabled flag set to false.
